vulnerability_findings.name: calls-loop
vulnerability_findings.message:
EBU.transfer has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(caddress.call(id,from,_tos[i],v[i])) (patch_0.sol#13)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_0.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (patch_0.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in EBU.transfer (patch_0.sol#4-16):
	-require(bool)(caddress.call(id,from,_tos[i],v[i])) patch_0.sol#13

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_tos' of EBU.transfer (patch_0.sol#7) is not in mixedCase
